もっとアイマス最高したい！(明日は舞台創造科です)(エムも履修したい)

Idolmaster staff, your response is quick, isn't it?  
As expected.

thread_replies.author: LENTO
thread_replies.text: MASSIVE

thread_replies.author: STANLEY SHARKS
thread_replies.text: Thank you very much. I appreciate your courteous report and the fact that you are addressing it. I look forward to the banners being safely displayed.

thread_replies.author: STANLEY SHARKS
thread_replies.text: ご対応ありがとうございます。 会場での掲出準備が進んでいるとのこと、安心しました。ポスター掲出も楽しみにしています！

thread_replies.author: YADOR
thread_replies.text:
Is this it...?  
It was there as of Thursday night, but maybe it flew away...  
It wasn't placed at the south exit where the wind seems the strongest, but still, it's scary when it disappears...

thread_replies.author: STANLEY SHARKS
thread_replies.text: ご対応のおかげで安心しました。今後もアイマスMOIW2025を応援させていただきます！

thread_replies.author: STANLEY SHARKS
thread_replies.text: Thank you for your prompt response. I'm looking forward to seeing the banners displayed safely. I'd also like to go see the posters put up.

thread_replies.author: YADOR
thread_replies.text: The last one that couldn't be found was the guest slot's Albanacht, and the artistic points are way too high for it to come together by P's power.

thread_replies.author: STANLEY SHARKS
thread_replies.text: As a fan, it's a bit disappointing that the lost banner hasn't been found yet, but since you've taken custody of the actual sample, that puts my mind a little more at ease. Plus, it's great news that the poster postings are progressing, and I'm looking forward to seeing them at
